items.name: Anchor
items.preference: I bring calm structure and keep standards steady.

items.name: Connector
items.preference: I connect people and build trust across the group.

items.name: Navigator
items.preference: I set direction and map the route to the goal.

items.name: Guardian
items.preference: I protect quality and reduce avoidable risk.

items.name: Explorer
items.preference: I seek new options and open fresh paths.

items.name: Energiser
items.preference: I lift energy and drive immediate momentum.

items.name: Synchroniser
items.preference: I align timing and keep the group in rhythm.

items.name: Decision-Maker
items.preference: I commit quickly and clarify who does what.

items.name: Innovator
items.preference: I challenge the status quo to raise performance.
